price: 4. Si uu u abaal mariyo kuwa (Xaqa)  rumeeyey oo samaha fala, kuwaa  waxay leeyihiin denbi dhaaf iyo Risiq sharaf leh (Jannada gudaheeda).
arabic: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
